channel.title: Comments on: Do Not Push Button

item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Please, tell me where that button is. I won't push it, I promise.
item.content:encoded: Please, tell me where that button is. I won’t push it, I promise.

item.title: By: Warboss
item.dc:creator: Warboss
item.description: A follow up/confession...I have pushed it more than once when no one is around...actually a couple times when there where others present....Hey! It's RED, how can I help not to push it! On the down side, nothing seemed to go faster afterwards.
item.content:encoded: A follow up/confession…I have pushed it more than once when no one is around…actually a couple times when there where others present….Hey! It’s RED, how can I help not to push it! On the down side, nothing seemed to go faster afterwards.

item.title: By: Warboss
item.dc:creator: Warboss
item.description: I still think releasing the tiger when the button is pushed is the way to go. And, you're right...I don't think they could have come up with a more tempting/conspicuous spot, color and size. After all, who doesn't want to hit a big red button with "PUSH" clearly stamped on it regardless of what some wall plaque says. Oh, and btw where the heck did they get such a gargantuan button?
item.content:encoded: I still think releasing the tiger when the button is pushed is the way to go. And, you’re right…I don’t think they could have come up with a more tempting/conspicuous spot, color and size. After all, who doesn’t want to hit a big red button with “PUSH” clearly stamped on it regardless of what some wall plaque says. Oh, and btw where the heck did they get such a gargantuan button?

item.title: By: Vans
item.dc:creator: Vans
item.description: This button attracts me much. I will surely press that button if I don't see anyone nearby :D
item.content:encoded: This button attracts me much. I will surely press that button if I don’t see anyone nearby ðŸ˜€

item.description: [...] Do Not Push Button (via Adam Kalsey) [...]

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
Dude, you forgot the <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Hitchhiker's_Guide_to_the_Galaxy" rel="nofollow">Hitchhiker's Guide</a> quote!
<blockquote>He reached out and pressed an invitingly large red button on a nearby panel. The panel lit up with the words 'Please do not press this button again.'</blockquote>
item.content:encoded:
Dude, you forgot the Hitchhiker’s Guide quote!

He reached out and pressed an invitingly large red button on a nearby panel. The panel lit up with the words ‘Please do not press this button again.’

item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: That kills me, man. It looks like something out of a cartoon. I'd push that damn thing all day long. I wouldn't be able to help myself.
item.content:encoded: That kills me, man. It looks like something out of a cartoon. I’d push that damn thing all day long. I wouldn’t be able to help myself.
